Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2019
Review Title: Amazon Basics has yet to disappoint
Review Description: I have a few Amazon Basics products, including a monitor stand and now these speakers.  They are much better than I was expecting for the price.  They have decent weight to them, they feel really good quality as opposed to the really plastic, light, cheap feel of similar priced products.  The design is sleek, the LEDs are nice, the sound is good quality. You won't obviously get the sound quality of a several-hundred-dollar surround system, but for $16 speakers these are fantastic.  My last set had a constant crackling sound, or a bit of a squeal when they weren't being used (when I left them on but switched to headset). These, thankfully, do not do that.My only criticism would be about how short the cord is between the two speakers.  I wanted to put them on either side of my dual monitor set up (I have 2 27 inch HP pavilions) but the wire connecting the two speakers together isn't quite long enough.  Considering how many people have dual set ups these days I do consider that a design flaw.Otherwise these are excellent little speakers.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2019
Review Description: You can't turn off the lights.  At all.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2020
Review Title: Great pair of inexpensive speakers. Free blue night-light included
Review Description: For the price, you can't beat these little speakers. The sound quality is a lot better than anything I was expecting given the price. They aren't exactly "bassy", but they surprisingly have a full, rich sound for their size.  They have two built-in blue leds with a acrylic/plastic diffuser in the base. It looks very cool and modern. IMHO, their design was very well thought out.Sadly, I use these in my office, and also in my bedroom, both of which I keep very dark (think caves, but without the bats). As other have mentioned, the blue leds are very bright. I was thinking of disassembling the speakers and installing a small SPST switch in each one to turn off the leds, but didn't want to destroy them in the process, so I did the simple fix instead. Electrical tape over the leds. If you are Goth/Emo/?, or has a child that is, you can borrow their black fingernail polish and use that instead of tape.Simple procedure, see attached images for directions. Warning: If you do this, you will most likely void the warranty. I apologize for the order of the images here. I tried 3 times, and Amazon randomized the order every time.Cheers!

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2019
Review Title: Good value overall but need to make the blue lights optional
Review Description: The title said it all.  For the money these speakers have a great quality but the bright blue lights that are always on can be a hassle. No off switch.  I put the computer in sleep mode most evenings and the blue lights on the speakers are not always welcome at night time.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2019
Review Title: Amazon basics has done it again!
Review Description: Amazon basics has done it again!! These are amazing speakers and have good sound. I bought them for my work computer so I didn’t want anything huge but still wanted good quality. These are the perfect compact speakers. Both have a blue halo around the base which looks nice but isn’t distracting. The volume control is a knob thatbis actually in-line in the wire cable going to the first speaker.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2019
Review Description: I don't normally write reviews but for the money, these speakers are awesome. Bear in mind they are inherently low power as they are powered by usb. If you are looking for high fidelity look elsewhere for something that that is 120v powered. But for a basic low cost desktop speaker you will be hard pressed to find a better deal.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2019
Review Description: I have been really surprised by the quality and sound of these speakers.  It is really more than worth the price.  I was replacing some very expensive boise speakers, these were Easy to install and on par or better sound. I would recommend purchasing no problem.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2019
Review Title: They made my Mac sound worse.
Review Description: I set them up and plugged them in and when turned up as far as it could go, my iMac sounded even better without them. I guess I bought them hoping they would enhance the sound but they actually made it worse. Gave it 2 minutes and such a disappointment I packaged it all up asap to get sent back.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2019
Review Description: Wanted some basic speakers that did not cost a lot of money. Ended up landing on these for the footprint, as well as the price. I really like how small they are, and how basic they are. I don't game or watch movies on my computer, but I wanted speakers that were more than just the laptop's speakers. These are easy to move if needed and look great on my desk. I especially like the blue lights that they have, give some character to my boring desk!

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2019
Review Title: Was not expecting a lot - sound quality still less than expectations
Review Description: Positive: These look great and they workNegative: Sound terrible. Bass is non existent. cord is way too short.Overall thoughts: I plugged them in and started up some music and YouTube videos. Wow. I was shocked at the poor sound quality. Sound is perfectly clear but the highs and lows are non existent. It seems like the put in one cheap low grade mind range speaker and called it a day. Not worth the $15 I paid. Not worth $10. These are just downright terrible sounding. Amazon should be ashamed. Did anyone at Amazon listen to these before they purchased loads of them? Amazon Basics items have always been good. This one is not. Look elsewhere if you want even mediocre sound quality. I may be too generous giving these one star. I figure they get a star because they work and look good but that is about it.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2019
Review Description: These come with a bright blue, always-on light in the base of each speaker.  Why would anyone want this feature?  Very annoying.  The only way to turn off the lights is to unplug the USB connection.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2019
Review Description: I stream business news while working in my home office.  These speakers are perfect for that with better than expected sound quality and volume control.  In addition, they don't take up much desktop space as I located them behind a monitor.  These replaced a pair of Dell speakers that failed.  The quality is much better.There are no drivers or software to install.  Just plug and play--very easy.Some reviews have complained about the lights at the base of the speakers.  Though I think that they are unnecessary, the lights are a non-issue for me.  They turnoff when the computer is shutdown.I will purchase these again if I need speakers for another desktop computer setup.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2019
Review Title: WARNING: Bright Blue Lights can NOT be shut off
Review Description: The speakers, for some unknown reason, actually have ring lights at the base that are not pictured when you buy them. These lights are bright and can not be shut off.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2020
Review Title: Easy to install and very good sound but awkward volume control button
Review Description: I was in the market for new computer speakers after my previous cheap set of computer speakers bit the dust and got fried. I immediately sprung into action, and it led me to this. Based on the mostly positive reviews, I ordered it."AmazonBasics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver" arrived at my house just the other days. The first thing that struck me is how compact both speakers are (about 4 inches wide, 3 inches high and 3 inches deep) and yet relatively speaking how heavy the set is (about 1.5 lbs), certainly as compared to the previous set of computer speakers. Equally important for someone like me who is the complete opposite of a handy man: how easy is it to install? Turns out to be quite easy: you connect the set's USB cable to the computer's USB slot  and the plug into the headphone jack and away you go. One note of caution: the set's volume control button is in the wire of the left side speaker, and frankly not all that handy. The best solution for that is to turn it way up and leave it there, and then to adjust your computer's volume settings accordingly. So what does is all mean? Well, I have been impressed with the quality of the sounds, as these computer speakers (each being 2W) sound rich and deep.Bottom line: this set of computer speakers is exactly what I was hoping for: easy to install and operate, and sounding very nicely. In other words, this set of computer speakers is exactly as advertised and as written up in the many positive reviews, to which I gladly add my own. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2019
Review Description: They are ok at best but the BRIGHT blue light is on all the time. Impossible to use if you sleep in the same room.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2019
Review Description: I bought these to replace some Bose speakers that were damaged in a move. I didn't expect the great sound quality of the Bose speakers, nor did I expect them to last forever. However, we've had them less than 6 months and they already need to be replaced. They worked well in the beginning, but the right speaker stopped working about 3 months in. In the past few days, the left speaker has started to get really scratchy. I've checked all the cables and connections. Everything is connected the way it's supposed to be, so I guess I'll just have to replace these with some better quality speakers.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2019
Review Title: Great little speakers. Pretty short wires.
Review Description: I just got these, so I cannot attest to their longevity. The speakers are really very nice looking, compact and provide great sound. They are all black except the bottom platform which is silver. The lights at the bottom are pretty bright in a dark room, so if you sleep in the same room and don't turn them off, you may be annoyed until you find a solution (cover/turn off). The wires... The USB power wire and the audio plug wire come from one speaker, we will call it the right speaker, and go to your device. The wire that joins the two speakers together goes from one to the other obviously. We will call that the conjoining wire. The CONJOINING wire is 31 inches long from the back of one speaker to the back of the other, so that is as far apart as they can be from each other. The POWER/AUDIO wire (they run together as one until 6 inches from the device end of the cable) is 44 inches long. That was not an issue for me, so I did not ding it for that, but it is something to consider if you have your hard drive located on the floor or in a remote location. I had to go into my settings for some reason to get these to work with my machine, so if you hook them up and get no sound, try checking your settings before you think the speakers are faulty. I like everything about them, so five stars from me.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2019
Review Description: Got these to listen to Pandora while i work.  Attached to my backup non VPN attached PC.  They tuck behind monitors to take up less space on desk and the speakers are low so the sound isn't blocked.  The sound really good for what they are, no complaints and very stylish.  Could do without the blue LED on them,  but that's just me.  Volume is loud enough, but don't expect them to compete with  higher wattage speakers and a sub - they won't.  But they are loud enough to crank up satisfactorily for Suffragette City, Radar Love, or The Road Goes on Forever and the Party Never Ends...  But for background listening, they're awesome.Wires are a bit short.  The separation shown in the picture is as far apart as they can get and was a pain to set up with anything else in the way because of that.  Far enough apart for good imaging, but another foot or two would make them easier to place.  They wires also seem a bit fragile but I didn't have any issues, just my perception.  I don't use the built in volume control (a rheostat on the speaker line) but tested it and it works fine.  I just turn it all the way up and use PC volume.Pros:  Good sound quality, stylish, price.  Cons: Wires are a bit short making them hard to setup.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2019
Review Description: I love the soft blue glow that emits around the bottom of speakers. Also like the fact that the Speakers are not light and flimsy. But have some weight to them and nice sturdy bottom. Using the Speakers on my HP touchscreen laptop. I definitely recommend them. Great sound quality too. Price I thought was excellent.

Product Title: Amazon Basics USB-Powered PC Computer Speakers with Dynamic Sound | Silver
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2019
Review Description: These speakers sound very nice for the 15$ price point. I also have the Creative Pebbles speakers & they are comparable. The Amazon speakers are "Crystal Clear" so if incredible speech clarity is paramount. i would choose these. The Creative Pebbles have a slightly "Richer Sound" and a bit more Low- End Bass. If that means more to you, get those for the extra 5 bucks. You can't go wrong with either though.
